posts.name: Luxury VIP Suite
posts.description: A premium cabin featuring a spacious layout, comfortable seating, a private bathroom, and a serene environment.

posts.name: Deluxe Family Cabin
posts.description: Designed for family use with ample space, cozy interiors, and all essential amenities for a comfortable stay.

posts.name: Standard Private Room
posts.description: An affordable option providing privacy, a comfortable bed, and necessary facilities for patients.

posts.name: Executive Suite
posts.description: High-end accommodation with luxury furnishings, personalized service, and enhanced comfort.

posts.name: Budget Cabin
posts.description: A cost-effective cabin with basic amenities and a comfortable atmosphere for patients on a budget.
